p: Zataria multiflora is another commonly used herb in patients suffering from PD due to its inhibitory effect against prostaglandin production. More specifically, thymol, as the main ingredient of this plant, blocks calcium channels that are responsible for endometrial cramps. 12 The effect of Zataria multiflora oil has been suggested to minimize the severity of pain in women with PD as well as to shorten the duration of pain. 12, 23, 24
